# How to open HEIC files on Windows 11

[from Tom's Hardware](https://www.tomshardware.com/how-to/open-heic-files-windows-11)

1. Attempt to open an HEIC file with the Photos app. ...

2. Click 'Download and install it now. ...

3. Confirm that you want to launch the Microsoft Store. ...

4. Click the '$0.99' button. ...

# How to convert HEIC to JPG or PNG using Preview

One of the easiest ways to convert an HEIC to a JPG is to use the Preview App:

[From backlight blog on the Mac and iPhone](https://backlightblog.com/iPhone-heic-to-jpg).

1. Open the HEIC file in Preview.

2. Click File > Export

3. From the format drop-down menu, select either JPG or Png.

4. Click Save.

5 .Click 'Buy'. ...

6. Confirm the purchase was successful. ...

7. Open your HEIC file.
